title: Riot fix your servers please
body:
So, me and many people are having ping trouble wich normaly would stick around 50ms and now, since the new client launch, sticks around 150ms. ive run inomerous tests to see if its my conection thats causing it but it was not, plus ive been playing other online games without experiencing any lag.
Are you at least aware of the issue and trying to fix it?


Edit: I live in portugal and ive seen so far that only us are experiencing this issue. welp?

replies.body: Even though you have solid net access elsewhere, you can still have issues specifically connecting to the game servers.  This can especially be so if your ISP has changed how it routes to us.  As a first step, I recommend ruling out any local issue possibilities by using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Hopefully, this will help get your ping fixed up.  Let me know.

same issues here and i have done most of the fixes in the  guide , no help  i usually get around 40-66 ping now am averaging around 120 to 150ms . i am from NA and see alot of EUW people with this issue and curious what could be causing this, i uninstalled deleted the game , had the fragments removed from my computer , reinstalled and still having this issue, when i try to move in game there is obv lag when you walking a jittering look cant  be firewall issues i disabled it , ativirus disabled as well so it aint that , its a direct connection and the firewall on my modem disabled as well. all the port in the guide are being used , no difference still 120+ms.

So i looked over that connection issues guide but i have none of the issues that is mentioned there as the possible cause for lagging. i tried fowarding the ports manually in hope of a miracle but nope, any ideas?
Same here man feelsfukingbad man pls help us rito wtf
